did.abstract: This collection contains 11 photographs related to the Pleasants Hardware Company of Richmond, Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pleasants Hardware Photograph Collection. PHC0074. The Valentine, Richmond, Virginia.

arrangement.p: Images are arranged by item number.
One oversized photograph (V.2019.92.07) is stored separately

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Henry A. Pleasants opened H. A. Pleasants Hardware at 1607 W. Broad Street in Richmond, Virginia in 1915. James T. Hatcher, Sr. began working for Pleasants that same year, eventually buying the business in 1952 with his son, James T. Hatcher, Jr. In 1975 the store moved west to 2024 W. Broad Street. In 1984, James T. Hatcher III joined the business, which was sold to the C. F. Sauer Company in 1989. In 1990, James T. Hatcher, Sr. and James T. Hatcher, Jr. retired from the company.
